import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import {faCalendar, faCirclePlus,faMagnifyingGlass} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import TextComponent from "./TextComponent"; import Filter from "./filter"; function HomePage() { const [data1, setData] = useState([]) const [show,setHide]=useState('false') const [selectedValues, setSelectedValues] = useState([]); const [checkedValues, setCheckedValues] = useState([]); const [uniqueCheckedValues, setUniqueCheckedValues] = useState([]); const [data2,setData2]=useState([]) const handleCheckboxChange = (e) => { const value = e.target.value; const isChecked = e.target.checked; console.log(" e.target.value", e.target.value) console.log("isChecked",isChecked) setCheckedValues(prev => { let updatedValues; if (isChecked) { updatedValues = [...prev, value]; console.log("updatedValues1",updatedValues) } else { updatedValues = prev.filter((item) => item !== value); console.log("updatedValues2",updatedValues) } const filteredData = data2.filter((item) => updatedValues.includes(item.location)); setData(filteredData); return updatedValues; }); }; const handleSubmit = () => { }; const showHide=()=>{ setHide(!show) } const fetchData= async () =>{ try{ const response= await fetch('http://localhost:8000/data1') const json= await response.json() console.log("data1",data1) setData(json) setData2(json) }catch (err) { console.log(err) } } const handleFilterValue = (value) => { console.log('Filter value:', value); }; useEffect(()=>{ fetchData() },[]) return ( <>

{/* FİLTER START

)}
) } export default HomePage
